Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT resource.resource_id FROM resource LEFT OUTER JOIN resource_submission ON resource.resource_id = resource_submission.resource_id LEFT OUTER JOIN resource_info ON resource.resource_id = resource_info.resource_id LEFT OUTER JOIN resource_info_type_lu ON resource_info.resource_info_type_id = resource_info_type_lu.resource_info_type_id WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT external_ref_id, project_id, notification_type_id FROM notification WHERE

Property.name: context
Property.Value: SELECT submission_id FROM submission INNER JOIN upload ON submission.upload_id = upload.upload_id WHERE
